ygData.subject: Re: Fletching information
ygData.msgSnippet: At the moment I only know of two places to buy the components. One is in Kelethin, and the other is in Surefall. I don t know of any evil friendly areas that
ygData.messageBody:
At the moment I only know of two places to buy the components. One is in
Kelethin, and the other is in Surefall. I don't know of any evil friendly
areas that have fletcher merchants. Sorry.

Rithannan of Cazic-Thule

----- Original Message -----
From: <XxKommiexX@...>
To: <EQ_Fletchers@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 12, 1999 8:03 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Fletchers] Fletching information


> From: XxKommiexX@...
>
> II am a Troll Warrior and would really like to start fletching. Question
is,
> where I get the parts for arrows? Since I am evil, can not go in most
towns.
> Is it impossibly for me to do it? Or is there some merchant somewhere that
I
> can buy the stuff from? Thanks.
>
> Kukok, Troll Warrior
> ~Veeshan~
